
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-07-20 00:22:54.900776                #
######################################


#leader_trait_adaptable #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_adaptable
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_adaptable
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_army_veteran #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_army_veteran
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_army_veteran }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_army_veteran
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_buccaneer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_eager } }
    }
    allow = {

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_eager }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_common = yes }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_eager }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_eager }

        }
    }

        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_veteran = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
        }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_veteran = yes }

        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_educator
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_educator }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }

        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_educator
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_educator }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_master_diplomat #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_master_diplomat_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_diplomat } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_master_diplomat
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_master_diplomat }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_master_diplomat_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_diplomat }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_master_diplomat
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_master_diplomat }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_peacekeeper #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_spymaster #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_spymaster_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_spymaster } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_spymaster
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_spymaster }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_spymaster_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_spymaster }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_spymaster
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_spymaster }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_supreme_organizer #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_supreme_organizer
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_totalitarian #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_totalitarian_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_totalitarian
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_picks = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_change_class_add_trait = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_totalitarian }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_deduct_cost_points_picks_paragon = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_totalitarian_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_totalitarian
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
        }
    }
}
